unit.creator: Philodemus || Verhasselt, Gertjan
unit.title: History of the Eleatic and the Atomistic Schools || Fr. 13 PHerc. 327 || Literary Apparatus

dsl.content: Fr. 13 1 Φιλ̣ο̣δή̣[μ]ο̣υ̣ Ranocchia 2019, 452 2 fort. Πε]ρ̣[ὶ] Δ̣η̣μο̣κ̣[ρ]ί̣[του (duce Puglia) vel Φιλ]ο̣δ̣ή̣μο̣υ̣ *: Ἐξ]ε̣[τ]α̣ϲ̣μό̣[ϲ] τ̣ῶ̣[ν φιλοϲόφω]ν̣ dubit. Ranocchia 2019, 452-455
